string-array.name: CREATE_TABLE_SQL
string-array.item: CREATE TABLE area (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,name TEXT)
CREATE TABLE desk (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,name TEXT,area INTEGER)

CREATE TABLE command (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,type INTEGER,desk INTERGER,goal INTERGER,direction INTERGER, speed INTERGER,music INTERGER,Error INTERGER,outime INTERGER,shownumber INTERGER,showcolor INTERGER)

CREATE TABLE robot (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT ,ip TEXT ,name TEXT ,outline INTERGER ,electric INTERGER ,area INTERGER, state INTERGER,robotstate INTERGER,obstacle INTERGER, commandnum INTERGER ,excute INTERGER , excutetime INTERGER ,commandstate INTERGER ,lastcommandstate INTERGER ,lastlocation INTEGER)
CREATE TABLE card (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,name TEXT,address INTERGER)
